meaningMnemonic: Your magic <radical>yoga</radical> <radical>brush</radical> lets you <kanji>build</kanji> what's in your mind's eye.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>build</kanji> a bridge. Immediately after, someone is climbing up onto it. It's <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai. He waves at you and says, "Did you build this? The craftsmanship is amazing."
